title: Rasesh M. Patel Sells 49,092 Shares of NRG Energy, Inc. (NYSE:NRG) Stock
text:
NRG Energy, Inc. (NYSE:NRG - Get Free Report) VP Rasesh M. Patel sold 49,092 shares of the business's stock in a transaction on Thursday, March 14th. The stock was sold at an average price of $62.59, for a total transaction of $3,072,668.28. Following the completion of the transaction, the vice president now owns 356,962 shares in the company, valued at approximately $22,342,251.58. The sale was disclosed in a legal filing with the SEC, which is available through this link.
